content:
Assign a Broadcast Topic to a Slack Channel

To let users share incident updates in Slack, assign a broadcast topic to one or more Slack channels. When an incident occurs, incident teams can send broadcast Slack messages to a channel based on a broadcast topic.

Available in: Lightning Experience with your standard Service Cloud license
Available in: Professional, Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions

Before you assign a broadcast topic to a Slack channel, create a broadcast topic.

NOTE Only public channels are supported for broadcast Slack messages.

Select the Assign to Slack Channel quick action from a broadcast topic record.
Select your Slack workspace.
Select the Slack channel that incident team members can send a broadcast Slack message to based on the selected broadcast topic.
Click Assign.

After you finish assigning broadcast topics, give users access to Broadcast Communication objects.
title: Assigning a Broadcast Topic to a Slack Channel in Service Cloud
